body: This mix of black powder and rock salt can only be loaded into a blunderbuss, a dragon pistol, or other scatter weapon. It deals nonlethal instead of lethal damage, and increases the misfire value by 1. You can use it only with a scatter weapon's cone attack.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Weapons/Firearms/Alchemical Cartridge/Salt Shot Cartridge
name: Salt Shot Cartridge
